post:
**About Tranzmedia**

Tranzmedia is a privately-owned company founded in year 2005 and located in India-Austria. Tranzmedia has been providing web hosting, VPS and dedicated servers since 2005. Tranzmedia was born out of a creative passion for conceptualizing and transforming simple ideas into serious technology platforms. Over the years, Tranzmedia has rolled out more than 100 major web sites, dozens of web solutions and technology platforms for clients in India and abroad. At Tranzmedia, we consider every one of our customers to be a part of our family. Our goal is to provide outstanding services for the best possible price. Our customers trust us because we provide updated hosting solutions with dedicated customer services. With the experience of 10 years Tranzmedia is proud to offer high quality VPS hosting at affordable prices.

**$4 Per Month OpenVZ - SolusVM Control Panel VPS**
